name: Jeff's Adventures
description:
This is my first ever fully created game. I know that the last scene shows grey behind the wall. It is intentionally done so. I hope you all enjoy the game as much as I did completing it :)

Controls:

-Double jump: Up arrow and directional arrows at the same time

-Move Left: Left Arrow

-Move Right: Right Arrow

-Jump: Up Arrow

-Fireball: E

-Ice Blast: Q
